alert.note: Alert for Central Walton; Coastal Bay; Inland Bay; South Walton; Washington (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 05 at 3:37PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northwestern Bay, southern Walton and southwestern Washington Counties through 430 PM EDT/330 PM CDT/... At 337 PM EDT/237 PM CDT/, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Eglin Air Force Base to 6 miles west of Santa Rosa Beach. Movement was east at 5 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Panama City Beach, Santa Rosa Beach, Eglin Air Force Base, Live Oak, Freeport, Ebro, Portland, St Andrews State Park, Villa Tasso, Seminole Hills, Gulf Resort Beach, Blue Mountain Beach, West Panama City, Seaside, Bahama Beach, Rock Hill, Biltmore Beach, Millers Ferry, Sunnyside and Gulf Pines. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with these storms. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.

area.areaDesc: Central Walton; Coastal Bay; Inland Bay; South Walton; Washington
